name: Malaysia Run
description:
Malaysia Run

This is a weird game.

I made most of it in Christmas of 2017 while I was sick and house bound in country I probably should have done more research about before arriving.  I wanted to make a game for my friends and I to play while we all recovered and Malaysia Run is the result.

I was pretty new to game development at the time so the rules are vague, the controls are eccentric and you might find a bug or two. That said, there is definitely something about the mechanics that is fun to play with.

CONTROLS [MENU]

Menu navigation: arrow keys
Play selected game: return

CONTROLS [GAME]

Movement: arrow keys
Action Menu: /
